text: "Ike's Wee Wee" is the fourth episode of the second season of the American animated television series South Park. The 16th episode of the series overall, it originally aired on Comedy Central in the United States on May 20, 1998. Trey Parker wrote and directed the episode. The story is about Kyle's little brother Ike having his bris, a ceremony in which the foreskin, part of the penis, is cut off. Kyle and his friends think the adults want to cut off all of Ike's penis, so they try to save him. Category:1998 television episodes Category:South Park (season 2) episodes
title: Ike's Wee Wee
